name: Traffic Run∞
description:
Let’s go through some exciting adventure of the car through traffic rush on signals.

Press & hold to brake and release to move faster in this complete action packed addictive gameplay mechanics

How to play:
• Press and hold to brake
• Release to speed up
• Park Car Safely
• Travel To Around Different World In upcoming updates
• Cross the checkpoint

Hours of fun in this challenging gameplay. Can you prove yourself to be the best car parker without crashing into other vehicles?
